name: Super Spacetime Traverse
description:
See how much you can survive in this space trip surrounded by dangerous asteroids, boarding a ship equipped with a shield that is capable of slowing time for incoming objects.

In-game help text:

The auto-charging shield slows time for nearby objects. Use it for protection.

When the shield is charged at maximum, release its energy to destroy everything around you, and score high!

Controls:

WASD/arrows - ship movement
Space/V/B - shield explosion
1 ~ 7 - change game resolution

Gamepads are supported

Game made for Game Boy Jam 5

Dev comments:

During the jam, I didn't have enough time to add some variation to the threats presented to the player, like enemy ships and black holes, so the game play ended up being really simple, although slightly original.

What I intentionally left out is items. I could add something to recharge life, but that would facilitate too much, prolonging play sessions without need. Also, filling the energy would diminish the risk of using the shield explosion, since the trade-off (opening your guard for a moment to unleash an attack) could be mitigated.
